mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.result as "result", a.studentId as "student.userId", b.realName as "student.realName", b.deptid as "student.dept.id", c.name as "student.dept.name", a.applystart,a.applyday, a.applyend,a.applytime, a.type,a.reason, a.teacherid as "teacher.userId", d.realName as "teacher.realName", a.teacherresult,a.teachertime, a.teachercommand, a.leaderid as "leader.userId", e.realName as "leader.realName", a.leaderresult,a.leadertime, a.leadercommand from leaves a left join user b on a.studentid = b.userId left join dept c on b.deptid = c.id left join user d on a.teacherid = d.userId left join user e on a.leaderid = d.userId where a.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from leaves where id = #{id} and result = #{result}
